fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020; Horizon Europe – the Framework Program 9 for Research and Innovation; InvestEU Program; NER 300 and its successor (the Innovation Fund).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
--Bilateral meetings with the DG research, energy and clima staff on issues related to research and innovation with a particular focus on climate and energy-related innovation support programs and those that aim to accelerate the curing Alzheimer’s disease.  
 
--Attendance of meetings and conferences (such as European Industry Days Days, Horizon Europe public hearings)
goals__remit:
Gates Ventures, LLC. is the private office of Bill Gates and supports initiatives and interests in energy innovation, education technology, advocacy, healthcare and more. 
Gates Ventures, LLC. seeks to develop global policy solutions in the areas of energy innovation and healthcare. 
 
www.gatesventures.com
